translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The reverse order of the law of conditionality, the triplets in the Paṭṭhāna,

analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  āsavaduka kusalattika
translated: The section on the three roots, the wholesome triad

original: Naāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā noāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na āsavam na kusalam dhammam paccayā no āsavaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With root-cause and wholesome as condition, a root-cause and a wholesome state arise, a wholesome state … a resultant state … an unwholesome state … an unwholesome state … a functional state … a functional state … a root-cause … a root-cause … a wholesome state … a resultant state … an unwholesome state … an unwholesome state … a functional state … a functional state … a condition by concomitance … a condition by nondisappearance.

original: Naāsavaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na āsavam na akusalam dhammam paccayā āsavaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With root-cause and unwholesome as condition, a root-cause and an unwholesome state arise, an unwholesome state … a resultant state … a wholesome state … a wholesome state … a functional state … a functional state … a condition by concomitance … a condition by nondisappearance.🔽With root-cause and indeterminate as condition, a root-cause and an indeterminate state arise, an indeterminate state … a resultant state … a wholesome state … a wholesome state … an unwholesome state … an unwholesome state … a functional state … a functional state … a condition by concomitance … a condition by nondisappearance.

original: Naāsavaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Nanoāsavaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na āsavam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  na noāsavam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With root-cause and indeterminate as condition, an indeterminate state arises, a condition by concomitance … a condition by nondisappearance.

original: (Dukamūlakaṁ ekaṁ. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: duka mūlakam eka saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: (One triad. Concluded.) With root-cause as condition, a root-cause … a condition by predominance … a condition by nondisappearance.
